backend/main.mo: Defines types and an actor storing mantras in a map with queries for fetching mantra numbers, text, and meanings by Veda, number, and language.
backend/migration.mo: Pass-through migration module that preserves the existing mantras map during upgrades.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking a frontend file to a requirement about correctly displaying mantra text for selected languages.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Lists prewritten summaries for key frontend files including hooks, App, CSS, and Tailwind config.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining color tokens and dark mode variables for the app UI.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that loads the React app into the root div.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React page handling dropdown selections, deep linking, queries, and rendering mantra text and meaning.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Provides a React Query hook that creates and caches a backend actor and refetches dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity context and provider for login, logout, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks to fetch mantra numbers, text, and meaning, normalizing missing data to null.
frontend/src/index.css: Custom Tailwind color palette and base styles for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps React with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider, then renders App.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration enabling dark mode, custom fonts, OKLCH-based color system, container settings, extended theme utilities, and animation keyframes.
project_state.json: Project state describing the mantra-browsing appâ€™s purpose, architecture notes, known issues, and a list of existing implemented features with versions.
